overview:
More than 12 years in Information Technologies, Internet, Mobile and Telecommunication industries. Strong industry knowledge & know-who, technical know-how, business development in the related sectors, especially in emerging fields like Internet & mobile media services.

He has served & worked with many Malaysian & Multinational companies. Among of them are: TMNet, AsiaOnlineLimited, E1000.com, Sapura System Malaysia, Enershia, Infinitium Group, Commerce Payment, Digital Tempo, Metadome, Ricochet, Sanrio Digital SEA, Iredia, Samsung SCC, Qualcom Hup, Myoutdoor, TIMwe

He has also founded & co-founded few of Malaysian & Multinational companies: Pancing.com, Onus Technologies, BeMobile, Qtelmedia, Sinomatrix, AMP, CellSafeInternational, LeBLanc

Specialties:Business Advisory Consulting in Mobile Media and Mobile Value Added Services for company that is interested to explore opportunities within South East Asia & Central Asia mobile marketplace
